response.overview: Present day. A small town in Arizona. The Townspeople are terrified. They have no gas. Their cell phones are dead. Mysterious sirens haunt their nights. They are convinced that Aliens will invade soon. The Priest blames the Townspeople for turning their backs on God. "REPENT. REPENT". A young woman, Sophia, hears voices telling her she must save everyone. At first, she refuses. Finally, she accepts. She heals Richard, a broken and suicidal man. When she rejects him, he accuses her of drugging and seducing him. The Townspeople accuse her of Witchcraft, of ruining a respectable man. They blame her for all their troubles.
response.title: Time of the Witch
